thread.title: Box Office Internship (2015-2016 Season) - Pro Sports
thread.title_full: Box Office Internship (2015-2016 Season) - Pro Sports

title: Box Office Internship (2015-2016 Season) - Pro Sports
text: Responsible for customer service of group, season, and individual ticket holders.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
